ENTRY.refkeywords: get return pileup pile up model
ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Return the pileup model associated with a data set.

DESC.PARA: The get_pileup_model commands returns the jdpileup model associated with a data set.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset to use; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")

DESC.PARA: Return the pileup model for dataset "src".

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
